name: The Nameless Two
description:
Up//Left/Right arrows key = move 

Left click = shoot 

Down = throw weapon 

Right click & drag mouse  = rotate left/right  (for style) 

Shift = change character 

Note: "GDL_Anniv2_LC0.exe" is the most recent executable of the game however may not work due to the engine failing. Therefor its probably best to download "LetsCreateV1.exe".
